movie.title: The Meg
movie.writer: Dean Georgaris (screenplay by), Jon Hoeber (screenplay by), Erich Hoeber (screenplay by), Steve Alten (based on the novel "Meg" by)
movie.actors: Jason Statham, Bingbing Li, Rainn Wilson, Cliff Curtis
movie.plot: After escaping an attack by what he claims was a 70-foot shark, Jonas Taylor must confront his fears to save those trapped in a sunken submersible.
